attributes.action: to stop bailing out financial institutions and start spending money on capital projects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like the government to spend the billions on major capital projects like high speed rail links,major city tram lines ,new high speed broadband.infastructure that is improved will help our economy more,will also put the money into peoples pockets instead of bankers who average 125,000 pound bonuses

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
